title: Heap Sort
steps: Step 1: Build a max-heap from the input array (heapify), where the largest element is at the root.
Step 2: Swap the root element (largest) with the last element of the heap and reduce the heap size.
Step 3: Heapify the root element to maintain the max-heap.
Step 4: Repeat steps 2 and 3 until the entire array is sorted.
